content:
1. Solution Title: CredentialBridge - Online & Offline Credential Verification Platform
2. Solution Description: CredentialBridge is a hybrid platform that digitally stores verified online credentials and allows employers to access, verify and trust them in real-time. CredentialBridge also generates a unique, tamper-proof verification link for each credential that can be shared by the student with future employers, showing that their credentials are verified, authentic, and valuable. With CredentialBridge, students attending online courses will have the same job market opportunities as traditional college graduates, as their online degrees and certifications are verified and trusted. 
3. Features: 
    - Online Credential Storage 
    - Tamper-Proof Verification Links 
    - Real-Time Verification 
    - Customized Verification Pages
    - User Management Tools 
4. Competitors: Accredible, Blockcerts, Parchment, TrueCred, Credly
5. Differentiator: 
CredentialBridge is the only platform that combines online and offline credentials, allowing employers to verify the authenticity and relevance of both digital and paper credentials with just one click. Additionally, CredentialBridge provides customized verification pages for each user and enables students to share unique, tamper-proof certificates with potential employers, thus building trust and strengthening their job opportunities.
pain_point_description: the value and recognition of online credentials are in question. some employers may not consider online degrees or certifications equal to traditional ones, which may lead to limited career prospects for students
